import java.util.*;
class three
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
int i,n,sum=0,count=0;
Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
int t=sc.nextInt();
while(t!=0)
{
sum=0;
n=sc.nextInt();
int arr[]=new int[n];
for(i=0;i<=n-1;i++)
{
arr[i]=sc.nextInt();
}
Arrays.sort(arr);
count++;
sum=arr[n-1]+arr[n-2]+arr[n-3];
System.out.println("Case"+" " +count+": "+sum);




t--;}



}



}
